name: Mirror Lover
description:
This is a casual strategy game with classic match-3 gameplay and special turn-based battles. Fight wits with the beautiful girl in the mirror through a very refreshing elimination game. After victory, you can not only get talent skill points for increasing attributes, but also unlock special exquisite CG~
Game features:
1. Customize the talent plus point system. When you encounter difficulties, you can use the plus point system to help you pass the level.
2. Refreshing elimination gameplay, classic match-3 gameplay, equal emphasis on strategy and luck.
3. Turn-based combat system, the beautiful girl in the mirror will not follow you obediently~
